name: portfolio1.0
desc: This is my current portfolio website that I developed using React. I hosted the web app on netlify. The v2.0 is under work with a blog section powered by FastAPI backend.

name: xTrack
desc: xTrack is a application that tracks expense created for a school project using PHP & MySQL

name: terminal-note
desc: terminal-note is a note taking app I developed in order to take quick notes from a command-line interface using Python. It has 2 variation, the first one uses a json file, and the second one uses a sql database.
